io.micronaut.views

Class ViewsFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.views.ViewsFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, io.micronaut.http.filter.HttpFilter, io.micronaut.http.filter.HttpServerFilter

    @Requires(beans=ViewsResolver.class)
 @Filter(value="/**")
public class ViewsFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.http.filter.HttpServerFilter
    Templates Filter.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
